backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no defined methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a requirement to update ReservationInfo component to display contact number +918638918243.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing components, pages, configuration, and styling for the Madhumita Moon Restaurant application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining OKLCH color system for light and dark themes with moonlit elegance palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, favicon references, and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the Home page component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright, year, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking and animated heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed header with restaurant branding (moon/utensils icons), navigation buttons for smooth scrolling to menu, specialties, and reservation sections.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with restaurant name in golden typography, moonlight visual effects, tagline, and CTA buttons for menu and reservations.
frontend/src/components/MenuSection.tsx: Menu display component showing four categories (Traditional Assamese, Moon Specials, Fresh & Light, Desserts & Beverages) in responsive card grid with icons and dish descriptions.
Reservation section displaying hours of operation, location with map link, phone number (+91 863 891 8243), and email in styled cards with icons.
frontend/src/components/Specialties.tsx: Specialties section highlighting four key differentiators (Expert Chefs, Fresh Ingredients, Signature Dishes, Premium Experience) with icons in responsive grid.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor using Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating and refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for React Query hooks related to backend functionality; currently empty with no implemented queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette (navy, crimson, golden) using OKLCH color space, custom fonts (Cinzel, Cormorant Garamond, Inter), and utility classes for the restaurant theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page component that composes Header, Hero, MenuSection, Specialties, ReservationInfo, and Footer components with a navy-to-crimson gradient background.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors (navy, crimson, golden), OKLCH color system, custom fonts, border radius variables, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the restaurant app state with one completed feature (displaying contact number in ReservationInfo) and one pending feature request to add contact number +918638918243.
